SELECT c.id AS classId, c.class_name AS className, u1.username AS charger,
FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN user_class uc ON u.id = uc.user_id LEFT JOIN class c ON c.id = uc.class_id LEFT JOIN `user` u1 ON c.user_id = u1.id ORDER BY u.id DESC LIMIT #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT
FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN user_class uc ON uc.user_id = u.id
AND uc.class_id = #{classId}
AND u.id NOT IN ( SELECT ude.user_id FROM user_do_exercise ude WHERE ude.exercise_id = #{exerciseId})

SELECT
FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN user_class uc ON uc.user_id = u.id
AND uc.class_id = #{classId}
AND u.id NOT IN ( SELECT udh.user_id FROM user_do_homework udh WHERE udh.homework_id = #{homeworkId})

SELECT
FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN user_class uc ON uc.user_id = u.id
u.id NOT IN (SELECT IFNULL(c.user_id,-1) FROM class c)
